actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a program of direct loans to eligible veterans for the purchase of residential property on which the Administrator of Veterans Affairs has foreclosed after default on loans guaranteed by the Veterans' Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to make loans to eligible veterans for the purchase of residential property on which the Administrator has foreclosed after default on loans guaranteed by the Veterans Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a program of direct loans to eligible veterans for the purchase of residential property on which the Administrator of Veterans Affairs has foreclosed after default on loans guaranteed by the Veterans' Administration, and for other purposes.
